paragraphs.title: Read the real-time Ratings coming from Users through Kafka

result.msg:
cassandraConfig: scala.collection.immutable.Map[String,String] = Map(keyspace -> fluxcapacitor, table -> ratings)
ratingsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [fromuserid: int, touserid: int, rating: bigint, batchtime: int]

paragraphs.title: Use the dataFrame API to query the real-time Ratings
Show number of distinct Real-time participating users
register the real-time Ratings as a temp table

result.msg: res178: ratingsDF.type = [fromuserid: int, touserid: int, rating: bigint, batchtime: int]

paragraphs.title: Use SQL to Show Most desirable users by Rating Count
paragraphs.text: %sql SELECT name, count(touserid) as count FROM ratings_temp JOIN actresses_and_actors_perm ON (ratings_temp.touserid = actresses_and_actors_perm.id) GROUP BY name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5

result.msg:
name	count
Ashley Judd	20
Leonardo DiCaprio	19
Sofía Vergara	14
Gail O'Grady	14
Morgan Freeman	14

paragraphs.text: %md ### Compare The Physical Plans Between DataFrames And SQL (Should Be Equal)

result.msg: Compare The Physical Plans Between DataFrames And SQL (Should Be Equal)

paragraphs.title: Explain Plan for SQL Query
paragraphs.text:
val topKUsersByRatingsDF = sqlContext.sql("SELECT count(touserid) as count FROM ratings_temp GROUP BY touserid ORDER BY count DESC")

topKUsersByRatingsDF.explain()

result.msg:
topKUsersByRatingsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [count: bigint]
== Physical Plan ==
TungstenSort [count#1668L DESC], true, 0
 ConvertToUnsafe
  Exchange rangepartitioning(count#1668L DESC)
   ConvertToSafe
    TungstenAggregate(key=[touserid#1609], functions=[(count(touserid#1609),mode=Final,isDistinct=false)], output=[count#1668L])
     TungstenExchange hashpartitioning(touserid#1609)
      TungstenAggregate(key=[touserid#1609], functions=[(count(touserid#1609),mode=Partial,isDistinct=false)], output=[touserid#1609,currentCount#1694L])
       InMemoryColumnarTableScan [touserid#1609], (InMemoryRelation [fromuserid#1608,touserid#1609,rating#1610L,batchtime#1611], true, 10000, StorageLevel(true, true, false, true, 1), (Project [fromuserid#1604 AS fromuserid#1608,touserid#1605 AS touserid#1609,batchtime#1606L AS rating#1610L,rating#1607 AS batchtime#1611]), None)

== Physical Plan ==
TungstenSort [count#1696L DESC], true, 0
 ConvertToUnsafe
  Exchange rangepartitioning(count#1696L DESC)
   ConvertToSafe
    TungstenAggregate(key=[touserid#1609], functions=[(count(1),mode=Final,isDistinct=false)], output=[touserid#1609,count#1696L])
     TungstenExchange hashpartitioning(touserid#1609)
      TungstenAggregate(key=[touserid#1609], functions=[(count(1),mode=Partial,isDistinct=false)], output=[touserid#1609,currentCount#1720L])
       InMemoryColumnarTableScan [touserid#1609], (InMemoryRelation [fromuserid#1608,touserid#1609,rating#1610L,batchtime#1611], true, 10000, StorageLevel(true, true, false, true, 1), (Project [fromuserid#1604 AS fromuserid#1608,touserid#1605 AS touserid#1609,batchtime#1606L AS rating#1610L,rating#1607 AS batchtime#1611]), None)
